original_text:
the oracle of him who hears the words of God,
    and knows the knowledge of the Most High,
who sees the vision of the Almighty,
    falling down with his eyes uncovered:
korean_text: 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 자가 말하며 지극히 높으신 자의 지식을 아는 자, 전능자의 환상을 보는 자, 엎드려서 눈을 뜬 자가 말하기를

sentences.original_text: the oracle of him who hears the words of God
and knows the knowledge of the Most High
who sees the vision of the Almighty
falling down with his eyes uncovered
